thread.section_title: The Lex NYC - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Holiday
thread.title_full: Holiday - Review of The Lex NYC, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Ian B
title: Holiday
text: Lovely hotel walking distance to most sights we didn't bother with buses and taxis as we walked to places quicker. Unfortunately it snowed while we were here and lots of places were closed because staff not being able to get too work. They were quick too clear pavements but they shovelled snow into gutters and made it impossible to cross roads ha.
